results.name: Powerpuff Girls: Mojo Jojo's Pet Project
Happy Time Cafeteria Project 02: A la Carte

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.53GHz
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT610
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is the lowest hardware I could test the game on - runs pretty good, actual requirements are probably lower. If runs slow, try disabling shadows
